changeSet.author: registry owner
changeSet.sql: CALL p_load_table_from_csv( 'koatuu' ,'${dataLoadPath}dict_koatuu_workshop.csv' , array['code','level1','level2','type','category','name'] , array['code','level1','level2','type','category','name'] ); CALL p_load_table_from_csv('ownership','${dataLoadPath}dict_formy_vlasnosti.csv', array['code','name']); CALL p_load_table_from_csv('staff_status','${dataLoadPath}dict_status_spivrobitnyka.csv', array['code','name'], array['name']);
